ygData.subject: A great EQ site I just noticed...
ygData.msgSnippet: I am in no way associated with this site, but I was so impressed with the content and message board style I thought I d pass it on.  *WARNING* There is
ygData.messageBody:
I am in no way associated with this site, but I was so impressed with the
content and message board style I thought I'd pass it on. *WARNING* There
is information on here that some people would consider spoilers so be
careful where you click... However, I think the majority of people would
greatly appreciate the info on this site. The message board has a great
format that I haven't seen before, but not a lot of traffic. The people
who are there are pretty knowledgeable and willing to answer, and I 've yet
to see anything remotely approaching a flame.

If you want to check it out, the address is: http://gameznet.com/eq/

The message board is "base" on the menu...

Again, I'm not in any way associated with the site so I wouldn't call this
advertising. It's just that many of the questions I see people ask that are
game-mechanic related, rather than development issue related, have answers
on this site....

Geran
